userRem.Question: Are you sure you wish to delete this account? (Y/N)
userRem.ResultFailure: Canceling deletion process, and returning to the previous menu.
userRem.ResultSuccess: User has successfully removed, returning to the Users menu.

en_us.userRem_CouldNotRemoveUser: Could not delete the user, please try again later, returning to the previous menu.
en_us.userChange_header: You can update the following information of a user, note that leaving the field empty will assume that the current value is to be used.
en_us.userChange_noUserSelected: Could not begin the process of editing because there is no user selected. Returning to previous menu.
en_us.userChange_fail0: Could not update the user please try again later.
en_us.userChange_noChange: No change in the information of the user provided, returning to the previous menu.

prodEdit.Header: Please fill in the information you wish to edit, note that leaving the field empty will assume that the current value is to be used.
prodEdit.ResultNoMatch: All fields for editing match the current fields, so no edits will be made, returning to the previous menu.

prodRem.ResultNoMatch: No product selected, please try again later. Retuning to the previous menu.
